text: The Panamanian Football Federation (; FEPAFUT) is the governing body of football in Panama. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1937. It became a member of FIFA in 1938 and CONCACAF in 1961. title: Panamanian Football Federation
